briefDescription: Function wrapper which contains a counter for the amount of times this is invoked.
detailedDescription: Function wrapper like std::function, which contains a counter for the amount of times this is invoked, and passes that along as the first argument to the contained function/functor.

templateParameters.name: FunctionSignature
templateParameters.description:
The signature of the contained function, like void(int, bool).
This must have int as its first argument.

overloads.description: Constructs a freed index_function, as in one that cannot be called.
Constructs an index_function containing the given function.

items.name: result_type
items.briefDescription: The return type of the contained function.
items.detailedDescription: The return type of the contained function.

items.name: argument_types
items.briefDescription: The parameter types of the contained function.
items.detailedDescription: The parameter types of the contained function, including the counter that index_function provides, in a [[type_list]].

items.name: argument_types_excluding_counter
items.briefDescription: The parameter types of the index_function.
items.detailedDescription: The parameter types of the index_function, not including the counter that index_function passes to its contained function, in a [[type_list]].

items.name: counter
items.briefDescription: Gets the amount of times the function has been called.

overloads.description: Gets the amount of times the function has been called.
Resets the index_function's counter to 0, making it think its function has been called 0 times so far.

Invokes the contained function, passing along the index_function's counter and the given arguments.
The parameter types for this is the types in [[index_function::argument_types_excluding_counter]]
